name: Week 1 - Artwork recreation - #1
description: This week, I have tried to recreate the artpiece Gravel by Georg Ness, using randomness

name: Week 1 - Artwork recreation - #2
description: This is another variation of the artipiece where i thought of aligning pebbles in rows, and the further down we go the messier it gets...

name: Week 1 - Artwork recreation - #3
description: In this variation i made the colours random in a similiar way that i added jitter and chaos in my recreation. This time I have a rainbow palette that is in its original order at the top row, but the further down we go, the more messed up the order of colours get...
